trial_T20190908_030236_260368.1: place two potatoes in the microwave . <<goal>> turn to your right and walk to the counter next to the microwave . pick up the potato on the counter . approach the microwave on your right . place the potato in the microwave . turn to your left and approach the brown counter in the middle of the room . pick up the potato from the counter . turn around and and walk to the microwave . place the potato in the microwave . <<stop>>
trial_T20190908_030236_260368.2: place two potatoes in a microwave . <<goal>> turn right and walk to the counter on the right side of the stove . pick up the potato . take a step right to the microwave . put the egg in the microwave . turn left and walk to the counter to the left of the sink . pick up the potato on the counter . turn around and walk right to the microwave . place the potato in the microwave to the left of the other potato . <<stop>>
